name: part_003
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'That's Why I Gave Up on Music' (だから僕は音楽を辞めた) by Yorushika.
scenes.song_name: That's Why I Gave Up on Music

scenes.description: Transition and stage lighting change between songs.
Amane Kanata performs 'Mela!' by Ryokuoushoku Shakai.

subtitles.original: バツを引いても どうしても消えなかった
subtitles.english: Even if I cross it out, it just won't disappear.

subtitles.original: 今更なんだから何も 思い出すな
subtitles.english: It's too late now, so don't remember a thing.

subtitles.original: 間違ってるんだよ わかってないよ あんたら人間も
subtitles.english: You're wrong, you don't understand, you humans too.

subtitles.original: 本当も愛も世界も 苦しさも人生も どうでもいいよ
subtitles.english: Truth, love, the world, pain, and life—I don't care about any of it.

subtitles.original: 正しいかどうか知りたいのだって 防衛本能だ
subtitles.english: Even wanting to know if it's right is just a defense instinct.

subtitles.original: 考えたんだ あんたのせいで
subtitles.english: I thought about it, because of you.

subtitles.original: 考えたってわからないが 本当に年老いたくないんだ
subtitles.english: I think and think but I don't know, I really don't want to get old.

subtitles.original: いつか死んだって思うだけで 胸が空っぽになるんだ
subtitles.english: Just thinking that I'll die someday makes my heart feel empty.

subtitles.original: 将来何してるだろうって 大人になったらわかったよ
subtitles.english: I wondered what I'd be doing in the future, and I found out once I became an adult.

subtitles.original: 何もしてないさ
subtitles.english: I'm doing nothing at all.

subtitles.original: 幸せな顔した人が
subtitles.english: Those people with happy faces—

subtitles.original: 憎いのはどう割り切ったらいいんだ
subtitles.english: How should I come to terms with hating them?

subtitles.original: 満たされない頭の奥の
subtitles.english: Deep inside my unsatisfied head,

subtitles.original: 化け物みたいだ 劣等感
subtitles.english: this sense of inferiority is like a monster.

subtitles.original: 間違ってないよな 何だかんだ あんたら人間だ
subtitles.english: I'm not wrong, right? One way or another, you're all humans.

subtitles.original: 愛も救いも優しさも 根拠がないなんて 君が悪いよ
subtitles.english: Love, salvation, and kindness having no basis—it's your fault.

subtitles.original: ラブソングなんかが 痛いのだって防衛本能だ
subtitles.english: Even love songs hurting is just a defense instinct.

subtitles.original: どうでもいいか あんたのせいで
subtitles.english: Is it whatever? Because of you.

subtitles.original: 考えたってわからないし
subtitles.english: I think and think but I don't know,

subtitles.original: 生きてるだけでも苦しいし
subtitles.english: and even just living is painful.

subtitles.original: 音楽とかもうわかんないし
subtitles.english: I don't even understand music anymore,

subtitles.original: 歌詞とか適当でもいいよ
subtitles.english: so the lyrics can be whatever.

subtitles.original: どうでもいいんだ
subtitles.english: I don't care about anything.

subtitles.original: 間違ってないだろ
subtitles.english: I'm not wrong, right?

subtitles.original: 間違ってないよな
subtitles.english: I'm not wrong, right?

subtitles.original: 間違ってないよな
subtitles.english: I'm not wrong, right?

subtitles.original: 間違ってるんだよ わかってんだ あんたら人間も
subtitles.english: You're wrong, I know it, you humans too.

subtitles.original: 本当も救いも優しさも 人生もどうでもいいんだ
subtitles.english: Truth, salvation, kindness, and life—I don't care about any of it.

subtitles.original: 正しい答えが言えないの だって防衛本能だ
subtitles.english: Being unable to give the right answer is just a defense instinct.

subtitles.original: どうでもいいや あんたのせいで
subtitles.english: I don't care, because of you.

subtitles.original: 僕だって信念があった 今じゃゴミみたいな思いだ
subtitles.english: I had convictions too; now they're thoughts like trash.

subtitles.original: 何度でも君を書いた
subtitles.english: I wrote about you over and over.

subtitles.original: 売れることこそが どうでもよかったんだ
subtitles.english: Selling well didn't matter to me at all.

subtitles.original: 本当だ 本当なんだ 昔はそうだった
subtitles.english: It's true, it really is true; it used to be like that.

subtitles.original: だから僕は
subtitles.english: That's why I...

subtitles.original: だから僕は音楽を辞めた
subtitles.english: That's why I quit music.

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it now?

subtitles.original: メラメラとたぎれ
subtitles.english: Burn, burn brightly.

subtitles.original: 眠っているだけの正義
subtitles.english: The justice that was just sleeping—

subtitles.original: こんな僕も
subtitles.english: even someone like me

subtitles.original: 君のヒーローになりたいのさ
subtitles.english: wants to be your hero.

subtitles.original: Mela!
subtitles.english: Mela!

subtitles.original: かっこいい君には
subtitles.english: To the cool you,

subtitles.original: 僕じゃ頼りないのかなんて
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'm unreliable.

subtitles.original: そりゃそうだよな だって
subtitles.english: That's only natural, because

subtitles.original: 今もこうして迷ってる
subtitles.english: even now, I'm lost like this.

subtitles.original: 手を取ってくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you take my hand?

subtitles.original: ギブアンドテイクさ
subtitles.english: It's give and take.

subtitles.original: 君が僕のヒーローだったように
subtitles.english: Just like you were my hero.

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it now?

subtitles.original: メラメラとたぎる
subtitles.english: Burning brightly,

subtitles.original: こんな僕にも潜む正義が
subtitles.english: the justice hidden even in me,

subtitles.original: どうしようもない衝動に駆られて
subtitles.english: driven by an uncontrollable impulse,

subtitles.original: ほら気付けば手を握っている
subtitles.english: look, before I knew it, I was holding your hand.

subtitles.original: いったい全体 そんなに荷物を
subtitles.english: Why on earth are you carrying

subtitles.original: 背負い込んでどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: so much baggage and where are you going?

subtitles.original: ねえねえ待って
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, wait.

subtitles.original: 僕にちょっと預けてみては？
subtitles.english: Why don't you try entrusting a bit to me?

subtitles.original: 信じてばかりの僕と
subtitles.english: And me, who only keeps on believing—
